title: Donald Pleasence
summary: Donald Henry Pleasence OBE (/ˈplɛzəns/;[2] 5 October 1919 – 2 February 1995[3]) was an English actor and World War II Veteran. He began his career on stage in the West End before transitioning into a screen career, where he played numerous supporting and character roles including RAF Flight Lieutenant Colin Blythe in The Great Escape (1963), the villain Ernst Stavro Blofeld in the James Bond film You Only Live Twice (1967), SEN 5241 in THX 1138 (1971), and the deranged Clarence "Doc" Tydon in Wake in Fright (1971).
